about_the_game:
In addition to the gorgeous visuals, one of the things that has astounded people about RiME is its beautiful, serene, and occasionally haunting soundtrack, made by the inimitable David García Díaz. So sit back, relax, and allow this music to transport your ears to the warm sands and blue skies of RiME's mysterious island.

Includes both the original soundtrack of RiME (27 tracks) and a set of 13 additional tracks, totaling over 85 minutes of music.
